name: material-you-newtab
description: A Simple New Tab (browser's home page) inspired by Google's 'Material You' design.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r scripts locales images svgs fonts favicon *.html *.css manifest*.json LICENSE README.md dist/ && cd dist && zip -r ../materialyounewtab-chrome.zip . -x 'manifest(firefox).json' && rm manifest.json && mv 'manifest(firefox).json' manifest.json && zip -r ../materialyounewtab-firefox.zip . && cd ..
